title: looking for silver player to duo with
body: look for silver  that wants to duo in ranked

replies.body:
Hello there.
I am a Gold 5 player with MMR of around a silver 2-3 (Some stuff happened).
I usually main Top, Jungle, ADC.
I browsed through your profile and i saw that you are pretty good at {{champion:412}} support.
You have other good champion plays too but that doesnt concern me as much.
If you dont mind we could duo as ADC/Support botlane if you want to.

I am a new Jhin main with an ok KDA of around 3.56, so add me up if you want to play together at somepoint, we can play a game of flex to see our compatability if you want at some point.
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=I%20Am%20Master%20Yi
i sent you a friend request
